description.en:
Google Translated from Japanese from Prod Description from Amazon JP  
  
ntroduction  
Draw school girls' live births and bottling belly H  
Starting with the “Nyoran!” Series,  
One book full of spawning sex in orgy & harem!!  
  
Special contraceptives were developed,  
The world where eggs formed in the womb by fertilization are bought and sold as food.  
In order to earn a living cost, sisters and brothers Shota 4P of school girls,  
Seeding party with black gals and fathers,  
Net idol estrus public spawn sex in front of the camera,  
Giant Harlem Etch, etc. that makes the entire lady school a spawning ground,  
Both sex and egg laying are full of charm of spawning sex too comfortable!  
Also includes a manga drawn by an egg selling girl's bottling stomach!

Ch 8. Tanetsuke Inferno (Mating Inferno)  
This guy wakes up in hell, he has died. He’s surrounded by succubi. They shatter his pride in bleeding pieces and next, group sex commences. But wait, there’s more. Here, succubi become impregnated in minutes, give birth in seconds to a new succubus, and the child grows up to “old enough” in as as few seconds as that.  
  
  
Amazon JP ISBN-13: 9784799210673
